<template>
  <section>
    <Navbar/>
    <Carousel :category="category"/>
    <router-view></router-view>
    <Footer/>
  </section>
</template>

<script>
import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';
import Footer from './components/Footer.vue';
import Navbar from './components/Navbar.vue';
import Carousel from './components/Carousel.vue';
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      category:[
        {
          category: 'Genç',
          path: 'category/genc-odalari',
          images:['https://www.ritmikgencodasi.com.tr/idea/mh/64/myassets/products/781/2.jpg?revision=1757504615','https://www.sandalie.com/idea/dm/23/myassets/products/292/retro-genc-odasi-takimi-2.jpg?revision=1746614150'],
        }
      ]
    }
  },
  components:{
    Footer,Navbar,Carousel
  },
  methods: {
  },
}
</script>

<style>
* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

body{
  background: black !important;
}
#categoryCarousel{
  display: grid;
}
.hero-img {
  object-fit: cover;
  max-height: 700px;
  width: 100vw;
}
a {
  text-decoration: none;
  max-height: 100px;
  font-size: 18px;
}
i {
  font-size: 25px;
}

</style>
